DAQBroker¶

DAQBroker is a framework aiming to provide instrument monitoring and control in an open, simple and expandable fashion. This framework consists of a set of Persistent monitoring applications written in the Python language, which are responsible for ensuring consistent and timely monitoring of each instrument created in the framework. Another important part of this framework is the Web Application that allows users to interact with the instrument environment via HTTP commands or with a user-interface via browser. This document contains detailed information on all the different components of the framework.
